message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 70/30 split seems fair considering the devaluation over time.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering the devaluation will affect you more than me. Let's get this over with.
Bob, let's be realistic.  This is the last round where my offer will even be close to your previous one. I'm willing to compromise at 65/35.
